holdings.text: The words performing specific services, in our opinion, mean, in the context, conferring particular benefits on the members
holdings.reasoning_summary: Term 'services' wide import in context of s.10 excludes theological/artistic; means tangible benefits conferred on members otherwise unavailable except for payment
